text: BING NEWS: Pope's upcoming visit inspires anxiety in Philadelphia The lack of clear information is breeding confusion and consternation in the City of Brotherly Love and contempt for the people who run it — particularly around the downtown parkway where Francis is expected to attend an outdoor concert and celebrate ... 07/30/2015 - 4:27 pm | View Link When An Artist Toys With Google Earth, The World Becomes A Geometric Playground "There are many ways of traveling.
